ATTENZIONE: Cliccando su questo pulsante verra' generato un {0} univoco per ogni utente invitato. Utilizzare questa funzione esclusivamente se si prevede che molte persone accedano contemporaneamente al {0} (come nel caso si tratti di un {0} di esame). ). The operation may take a long time to be completed. Do not close the browser until the confirmation screen will appear.

ATTENTION: By clicking on this button, a unique questionnaire for each invited user will be created. Use this function only if many users are expected to simultaneously access the questionnaire (as it may happen in the case of an exam questionnaire). The operation may take a long time to be completed. Do not close the browser until the confirmation screen will appear.

ATTENTION: by clicking on this button, a unique poll for each invited user will be created. The operation may take a long time to be completed. Do not close the browser until the confirmation screen will appear.

ATTENTION: by clicking on this button, a unique questionnaire with random questions for each invited user will be created. The operation may take a long time to be completed. Do not close the browser until the confirmation screen will appear.

ATTENTION: by clicking on this button, a unique self-assessment questionnaire for each invited user will be created. The operation may take a long time to be completed. Do not close the browser until the confirmation screen will appear.

ATTENTION: by clicking on this button, a unique request of meeting participation for each invited user will be created. The operation may take a long time to be completed. Do not close the browser until the confirmation screen will appear.

ATTENTION: by clicking on this button, a unique questionnaire with random questions (with multiple attempts) for each invited user will be created. The operation may take a long time to be completed. Do not close the browser until the confirmation screen will appear.

ATTENTION: the compilation is blocked!
In order to allow the invited users to complete the questionnaire, activate the compilation at the page “Questionnaire management”.

ATTENTION: the compilation is blocked!
In order to allow the invited users to complete the poll, activate the compilation at the page “Questionnaire management”.

ATTENTION: the compilation is blocked!

ATTENTION: the meeting is blocked and DO NOT ALLOW the compilation!
In order to allow the users to complete it, activate the compilation at the page “Meeting management”.

ATTENTION: the compilation is blocked!
In order to allow the invited users to complete the questionnaire with random questions (with multiple attempts), activate the compilation at the page “Questionnaire management”.

Print the pages for hand delivery to the users invited to the questionnaire. The document will include the password for the user access to the questionnaire compilation and the selected question codes for any selected users.
